ygData.subject: Re: Dark Reaver
ygData.msgSnippet: I would have passed but for calling someone a retard you should atleast get your facts straight.  The Ghoul Cavalier while he *DOES* spawn on the same floor
ygData.messageBody:
I would have passed but for calling someone a 'retard' you should atleast
get your facts straight. The Ghoul Cavalier while he *DOES* spawn on the
same floor as the Executioner does *NOT* spawn in the 'exe room', 'you
retard' rather if you have just come down from the floor with Savant, turn
left take that passage to the end, turn left again and you will enter a room
with the Cavalier.

Kanis Wyrmslayer
----- Original Message -----
From: Jared Hughes <jaredh@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, October 28, 1999 2:08 PM
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Dark Reaver


> From: "Jared Hughes" <jaredh@...>
>
> sure ok
> a quest for an item they can't even equip, you retard
> ghoul cavalier in exe room drops adamantium epolets common, and dark
reaver
> rare
>
> Veldra Rae`lynn
> lvl 42 magician
> Veeshan
>
